TEXT.TITLE: SUFFIELD'S <SSBK> COASTAL <CSBK> BUY CLEARED
TEXT.BODY: Suffield Financial Corp said it has received approvcal from the Maine Bureau of Banking for its proposed acquisition of Coastal Bancorp of Portland, Maine, and the acquisition is expected to close around April One. The approval was the last regulatory clearance required for the transaction. Reuter
